p: Candidate drug targets - In the search for a treatment for COVID-19, several viral and host molecular proteins have been explored as potential drug targets. Overall, they participate in key events of the virus infection cycle, such as cell entry and replication, as well in host metabolic pathways and immune response. In the following topics we will address in more details some of these targets. Drugs under investigation for blocking the main steps of the SARS-Cov-2 virus replication cycle are indicated in Fig. 2.
